attributes.long-description:
LocoRoco™ returns to your PSP® system! Complete with all the unique gameplay that made it an instant classic along with brand new abilities and challenges!

Armed with a deadly song that kills all living things, the evil Moja army have returned to enslave the LocoRoco™! Help the LocoRoco™ bring life and music back to the planet in this exciting new sequel.

• New colorful stages and hidden challenges to discover
• Enhance LocoRoco™ by collecting music notes
• Play 6 exciting new mini games
• Ad-hoc 4 player battle
• New LocoRoco™ Actions!
-Climb inside an afro and destroy obstacles
-Jump from grass blade to grass blade
-Sing together and collect notes
-Swim underwater

LocoRoco is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. © 2006 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: LocoRoco™ 2
